argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dral1.1 | |- ( A. x x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_hbae | |- ( A. x x = y -> A. z A. x x = y ) |
| 3 | 2, 1 | #P_albidh | |- ( A. x x = y -> ( A. z ph <-> A. z ps ) ) |
\
 Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. Part of Theorem 9.4 of [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of preprint).  Version of ~ dral2 using ~ ax-c11 .  (Contributed by NM, 27-Feb-2005.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
